EmailTemplate.subject: ACI Worldwide Realizes Seven-Figure Savings with Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/Turbonomic-ACIWorldwide-Success-Story.pdf]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
At ACI Worldwide <[[http://turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/Turbonomic-ACIWorldwide-Success-Story.pdf]]>, performance, stability, and compliance is of the utmost importance. Through workload automation with Turbonomic, ACI Worldwide improved team productivity, improved resource utilization from 50% to 75% while maintaining SLA adherence, and ultimately realized seven-figure savings in SWL licensing costs through intelligent workload consolidation
<[[http://turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/Turbonomic-ACIWorldwide-Success-Story.pdf]]>
Want to learn how we can help your organization? See how over 1,900 of our customers <[[https://turbonomic.com/customers/customers-by-industry/]]> leverage workload automation to simultaneously optimize performance, cost and policy compliance in real-time.
Regards,
Team Turbonomic
